wordGroup: chronic renal failure 慢性肾功能衰竭；慢性肾衰竭
renal transplantation 肾移植，肾脏移植
renal cell carcinoma 肾细胞癌；肾脏上皮肾细胞癌
renal disease 肾脏疾病；肾功能障碍
renal tubule n. 肾小管；肾细管
renal calculus n. 肾结石（等于kidney stone）
renal cortex 肾皮质；肾脏外皮
chronic renal insufficiency 慢性肾功能不全

sentences.en: He collapsed from acute renal failure.
sentences.cn: 他的身体因严重的肾衰竭而垮掉了。

sentences.en: The objective is to study the effect of salvia miltiorrhiza on activity of cytochrome C oxidase in acute renal ischemic reperfusion injury.
sentences.cn: 目的是为了研究丹参对肾缺血再灌注损伤细胞色素 C 氧化酶活性的影响。

sentences.en: Chronic exposure to Cd mainly causes the renal proximal tubule damage, which represents that the excretion of proteinuria, glucosuria and aminoaciduria.
sentences.cn: 慢性接触镉主要引起肾小管损伤，表现为蛋白尿、糖尿和氨基酸尿。
